title: Heirloom Chandbali Earrings with Polki Diamonds and Ruby Cabochons
features: Classic Chandbali (Crescent Moon) design featuring a cluster of Polki diamonds surrounding two prominent Ruby Cabochons. The Polki diamonds are set in a closed setting which gives them a natural and earthy appearance. The gold is crafted with the traditional Hyderabadi polish which gives it a rich, matte finish. The overall design evokes the grandeur of the Nizam era.
colors: and the subtle shimmer of Polki diamonds.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranti
and special family gatherings. These earrings also make a striking statement piece for upscale evening events.
description: A timeless heirloom piece crafted with exquisite detail. The use of Polki diamonds and Ruby Cabochons lends a regal and antique appeal. The Hyderabadi polish ensures durability and enhances the gold's luster. This is a unique piece that blends traditional craftsmanship with unparalleled elegance and carries a legacy of South Indian heritage.
